participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and easy-going, loves to have fun and enjoy the simple pleasures in life.
participant_1.background: I want to own a house on a beach. My parents both are school teachers. The only music I listen to is pop, because it makes me feel happy. I love eating at McDonald's. Watching NASCAR races is a great way to spend a Sunday for me.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Creative and sociable, enjoys connecting with others and has a deep passion for music.
participant_2.background: I like to sing Broadway show tunes. I have a cat named Seven of Nine. I work at a coffee house. I am a student at Michigan State University. My favorite TV show is Dancing with the Stars.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello!
What do you do for fun?
I love to sing broadway show tunes!
Really? That's so cool! I love listening to show tunes.
Oh, me too! I think they're so beautiful and inspiring.
What's your favorite show tune?
That's a hard question! I have so many favorites. But I think I'd have to say "Somewhere Over the Rainbow" from The Wizard of Oz.
That's a great choice! It's such a beautiful song.
I know, right? It always makes me feel happy.
What else do you like to do?
I also love working at my coffee shop. I get to meet so many interesting people.
Oh, that's great! I bet you hear all sorts of stories.
I do! It's always fun to learn about people's lives.
What's your favorite thing about your job?
I love making people happy. When I make a great cup of coffee and see someone's face light up, it's the best feeling in the world.
That's so sweet! You seem like a really great person.
Thank you! I try to be.
So, what are you studying at Michigan State?
I'm majoring in music education. I'm hoping to be a music teacher someday.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll be a great teacher.
Thank you! I hope so.
Well, it was nice meeting you. I hope we can talk again soon.
It was nice meeting you too! I hope so too.
